item.title: Rithm Capital Corp 10-K
item.description: Rithm Capital Corp, which is in the Real Estate Investment Trusts [6798] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 17, 2023 had 81160 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 1078 instances mortgage - 869 instances value - 839 instances may - 682 instances capital - 681 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
